attributes.action: Honour the Queen by bestowing "The Great" after her name for Platinum Jubilee
attributes.additional_details: Even though she is head of state. She abides by the will of Parliament and devoted to her subjects. As government and Parliament, it is our sworn duty to do the same to bequeath titles to our head of state.
attributes.background: To coincide with the festivities, and despite recent tremors, I believe Her Majesty, for her seventy years of service, should be honoured by government and Parliament to award her the title "Queen Elizabeth II The Great"; a title not since bestowed since King Alfred.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for a monarch to be given a particular title.
